newsitem.title: USA: GREENWAY MAKES OUTBOARD MARINE BID.
newsitem.headline: GREENWAY MAKES OUTBOARD MARINE BID.

text.p: A Greenway Partners affiliate said on Thursday that it is starting a $18 a share cash tender offer for shares of Outboard Marine Corp starting August 8.

Investors in Greenmarine Holdings, the affiliate of Greenway that counts Soros Fund Management LLC as investors, have agreed to contribute to Greenmarine at least $241 million in cash and two million shares of Outboard Marine, Greenway said in a statement.
Greenmarine Holdings has also obtained a commitment from American Financial Group to provide up to $150 million of the financing to complete the deal, it said.
Detroit Diesel Corp currently has a pending $16 a share offer for Outboard Marine, which values the company at approximately $500 million in cash and stock.

Greenmarine's offer is conditioned upon Outboard Marine redeeming its rights plan, that the merger can be completed without a supermajority vote under Outboard Marine's bylaws and termination of the Detroit Diesel agreement among other terms.
The tender offer and withdrawal period will expire 1700 EDT on September 8, 1997, Greenway said.
